data.title: Taylor Double Breasted Blazer
data.description: Featuring a chic collarless design and refined modern tailoring, this blazer offers a sophisticated edge and flattering fitTailored, fit Soft woven fabrication, Collarless v-neckline, Darts at the bust and collar, Double-breasted design with single button closure, Welts at the hip, Button cuffs.

details.Fabric: 78% Polyester, 17% Viscose, 5% Elastane. Lining: 95% Polyester, 5% Elastane
details.Collar Type: Collarless v-neckline, Darts at the bust and collar

data.title: Sawyer Asym Velvet Drape Dress
data.description: Cut in a flattering asymmetrical drape with a sleek velvet finish, this dress is a sophisticated choice for formal events, Fit and flare silhouette, Lustrous velvet fabrication, Asymmetrical neckline, Long fitted sleeves, Ruching through the shoulders and side waist, Asymmetrical waist and hemline, Flowing ankle-grazing skirt with side slit, Slip-on style and Lined.

details.Length: Flowing ankle-grazing skirt with side slit

data.title: Lexi Self Knit Tank
data.description: This comfortable tank top offers an elevated look with intricate striped knit patterns, Fitted silhouette, Patterned knit fabrication, High neckline and Slip-on stylee.

data.title: Becca Print Shirt
data.description: Embrace a resort-chic feel with this breezy satin shirt, Regular fit, Lustrous satin fabrication, Classic collar, Short sleeves, Button-through front and 100% Viscose.

data.title: Harvey Notched Neck Satin Shirt
data.description: With a comfortable feel and beautiful drape, this garment contains branded viscose fibre that is sourced from sustainably managed forests. LENZING™ ECOVERO™ is a trademark of Lenzing AG. A timeless shirt with a sophisticated satin lustre, Regular fit, Lustrous satin fabrication, Classic collar, Gold-tone, button-through front, Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and 100% Viscose

data.title: Tashi Tie Neck Tank
data.description: An elegant blouse with a sophisticated tie-neck for customisable flair, Regular fit, Lightweight woven fabrication, High neckline with asymmetrical tie detail, Sleeveless design, Back keyhole and button fastening and Lined.

data.title: Alora Lace Bodice Maxi Dress
data.description: This garment contains recycled polyester, which reuses existing plastic material. This reduces reliance on virgin materials. Embrace refined femininity and romantic detailing with this elegant maxi dress, Regular fit, Woven blend fabrication, Boat neckline, Sleeveless design, Lace and sequin embellished bodice, Asymmetrical waist seam, Flowing satin maxi skirt with gathering through the side hip, Concealed zip fastening and Lined.

details.Length: Flowing satin maxi skirt with gathering through the side hip

data.title: MARQUEE Hot Pink Ombre Co-ord Set Blazer
data.description: Elevate your wardrobe with our stunning Hot Pink Ombre Blazer, a masterpiece of sophistication and style. This blazer features a striking hot pink ombre design that transitions beautifully from deep to light hues. Tailored to a regular fit with a peak lapel collar and long sleeves, it exudes timeless elegance. The single-button closure adds a refined touch, while front darts and flap pockets ensure a flattering silhouette with functional appeal. The curved blazer hem falls gracefully below the hips, creating a chic and versatile look that pairs effortlessly with both formal and casual ensembles. Crafted with impeccable attention to detail, our Hot Pink Ombre Blazer is a must-have for the modern woman who appreciates classic yet contemporary fashion.

data.title: Maroon Tailored Co-ord Set Blazer
data.description: Introducing our elegant Maroon Shawl Collar Blazer – a timeless piece that effortlessly combines sophistication with a touch of summer charm. This blazer features a chic front-open design, complemented by a graceful shawl collar. The 3/4 sleeves add a modern twist, with subtle rushing at the hem for a touch of feminine flair. Crafted to perfection, the blazer gracefully falls at the hip, striking the perfect balance between classic and contemporary. Its rich maroon hue adds a touch of warmth and versatility to your wardrobe, making it an ideal choice for various occasions. Style Note: Pair this blazer with tailored trousers or a sleek skirt for a polished office look, or throw it over a summer dress to elevate your casual ensemble.

data.title: Jacqui Petite Shirt
data.description: With a super-soft hand feel and beautiful drape, this garment contains branded lyocell fibre that is sourced from sustainably managed forests. TENCEL™ Lyocell is a trademark of Lenzing AG. This stylish shirt plays with texture for a modern look that effortlessly transitions from office to after hours, Regular fit, Lightweight textured fabrication, Classic collar, Button-through front, Cut-out embellishment throughout, Long, semi-sheer sleeves with deep button cuffs and Cami lining with sheer overlay
